snippet: Axiom, a new-music ensemble of Juilliard students, plays John Adams and Toru Takemitsu at Alice Tully Hall.
abstract: Corinna da Fonseca-Wollheim reviews performance by new-music ensemble Axiom at Alice Tully Hall.
lead_paragraph: Axiom, a new-music ensemble of Juilliard students, plays John Adams and Toru Takemitsu at Alice Tully Hall.

headline.seo: Axiom, a Juilliard Ensemble, at Alice Tully Hall
headline.main: Newly Minted New-Music Experts Leap Over a Cascading Niagara
